long_description: The Platypus GravityWorks(TM)/CleanStream(TM) hose kit includes 2 taste-free replacement hoses, a male quick-disconnect fitting and a shut-off hose clamp. Silicone hoses won't impart a taste on your water. Inlet hose measure 12 in. long; outlet hose measures 48 in. long. Hose kit keeps your Platypus GravityWorks or CleanStream water filter system (sold separately) in tip-top shape.
short_description: The Platypus GravityWorks(TM)/CleanStream(TM) hose kit includes 2 taste-free replacement hoses, a male quick-disconnect fitting and a shut-off hose clamp.
